title: Why can't I load shop with 3G anymore?
body:
Hey Riot,

After the new launcher I cannot use shop anymore with 3g. I got really annoyed and thought I'd share with you guys 20 patches later. With the old patcher 3g and the shop used to load nice and smooth now I cant even load it... Why is this?

http://i.gyazo.com/9cc3d632e06fdb57efa2c34b47b0916e.png

I'm using vodafone 3g.

kind regards,

Dancing
Stranger

replies.body:
That wouldn't be because of your 3G. The speed of the connection would not cause formatting issues, it would just take longer to load, that's all.

What this looks like is an incorrectly configured Internet Explorer. If you're on Windows, then open up Internet Explorer, go into the config and reset it to default. Then, go into security settings and set it to low.

Best of luck.
